name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby>リンドルム

summoning_condition.en: You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF.

requirement.en: You have no cards in your Extra Deck during the turn you Tribute Summoned this card in Attack Position.

effect.en: Your opponent chooses 2 cards on their field, and you shuffle 1 of them into the owner's Deck.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
